name: Beef Jerky
steps: Place Steak in the freezer for about 20 minutes
Shave off excess fat from the Steak (won't dry well)
Cut Steak into 1/8"-1/4" strips, perpendicular to the muscle fiber grain
Submerge Steak strips in the Marinade overnight (12-24 hours)
Remove strips from marinade, ensuring the outsides aren't still heavily coated in marinade
Space out the strips on an oven-safe metal grate, and place the grate on an oven pan
Put pan in the oven for 2 hours
Flip the strips and put back in the oven for an hour and a half
Remove from the oven and let sit for 15 minutes at room temperature
Transfer to a resealable bag and seal them suckers in
Refrigerate to keep them good, they should last about 4 weeks
